nodes.text: The battle on Dakot Seven was a small-scale conflict that saw the Jedi Padawan Arn Peralun and his master attempt to defend the native population from slavers. But incoming fire from the slavers killed his master while Peralun received serious injuries. But the native people were able to provide him with cybernetic replacements in order to keep him alive since the natives did not use neither kolto or bacta.
